Protein FASTA Database Handling

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Protein FASTA Database Handling](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/proteomics/tutorials/database-handling/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
